## Success.aggregateError() method

Propagates interior result, appending any error message to the supplied errors array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
aggregateError(errors: string[]): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  errors | string\[\] | String array to which error messages are aggregated. |

**Returns:**

this
